basics.name: Carleton (Cam) Moore
basics.label: Assistant Professor
basics.summary: I am an Assistant Professor teaching Introduction to Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii, Manoa.

work.company: Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii

highlights: Helped design, develop, test and deploy RadGrad and RadGrad2: Developing awesome computer scientists, one graduate at a time.
Helped design, develop and test Makahiki2 an open source serious game engine for sustainability.

work.summary: Software Engineer on various Information Assurance projects.

work.company: Pacific International Center for High Technology Research (PICHTR)
work.summary: Designed, developed, and tested World Wide Web systems for the State of Hawaii.
Designed, developed, tested and evaluated Project LEAP, the Annotated Egret Navigator, and HBS hypermedia database.

work.company: United States Army, Ft. Polk, La.
work.summary: Assistant Staff Officer for Intelligence and Security 2nd BDE 5th ID, Platoon Leader A Co, 105 MI Battalion
